div.a: 2020 Voting Results for Sanborn Regional School District

span.p: Dear Kingston and Newton Community Members,

We are humbled by your support at the polls on March 10th. We now have a clear indication, from you, on the direction we will be taking at Sanborn. Our school district will be completely reorganized for the 2020-2021 school year and we will be improving the educational experience for all of our students using all of the resources we have available to us as a result of your support.

As I have said before, there are five things that are necessary to provide excellent instruction for all of our students: an aligned curriculum, high quality professional development for teachers and staff, strong Professional Learning Communities that look at data regularly, academic intervention to support student learning, and parental involvement. These are the foundational components for our work at Sanborn, and we look forward to building the future.
To view voting results, please click here.
